title: Orange Tea Cake
abstract: It seems to be a good season for oranges in downtown Colbo, hence the orange tea cake. I’ve used a recipe by Stephanie Alexander for inspiration.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh orange juice (from an extra orange)
method: Pre heat oven to 190º, butter and line a 20cm ring tin. I only have a square 20cm.
Combine all cake ingredients in a food processor and blend for two minutes until smooth and creamy.
Pour into  the prepared tin and bake for 30-35 minutes.
Leave in tin for five minutes before turning onto a wire rack.
Beat all ingredients until smooth (NOT the peel).
Warm icing over hot water until it thins and pour over the cake.
Big shout out to Jules of the Colbo Pub. ‘Thanks for the oranges. Best tasting oranges!’
